ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'

about.summary: 'Java' .jar files for the 'Tabula' <http://tabula.technology/> 'Java' library, which are required by the 'tabulizer' R package. The version numbering of this package corresponds to versions of 'tabula-java' library releases <https://github.com/tabulapdf/tabula-java/releases/>.

'Java' .jar files for the 'Tabula' <http://tabula.technology/> 'Java' library, which are required by the 'tabulizer' R package. The version numbering of this package corresponds to versions of 'tabula-java' library releases <https://github.com/tabulapdf/tabula-java/releases/>.

name: r-tabulizerjars
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0.1' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-tabulizerjars
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/tabulizerjars_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/tabulizerjars/tabulizerjars_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 22b93a91e73ba0fbed26f57e6ccf53fc536a6236ba23792b8008d7fffd13b600

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  script: R CMD INSTALL --build .
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip  # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rjava
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rjava

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('tabulizerjars')"

about:
  home: https://github.com/ropensci/tabulizerjars
  license: MIT
  summary: '''Java'' .jar files for the ''Tabula'' <http://tabula.technology/> ''Java'' library,
    which are required by the ''tabulizer'' R package. The version numbering of this
    package corresponds to versions of ''tabula-java'' library releases <https://github.com/tabulapdf/tabula-java/releases/>.'

  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - ocefpaf
